meeting_info.organization: Government Performance and Financial Management Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Briefing Room, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the January 22, 2024 Government Performance and Financial Management Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Central Appraisal District 2024/2025 Proposed Budget Overview and Reappraisal Plans
agenda_items.description: Overview of the proposed budget and reappraisal plans for the Dallas Central Appraisal District.
agenda_items.presenter: Shane Docherty, Chief Appraiser/ Executive Director, Dallas Central Appraisal District; Cheryl Jordan, Deputy Chief Appraiser, Dallas Central Appraisal District

agenda_items.title: Overview of Artificial Intelligence
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the implications and applications of artificial intelligence.
agenda_items.presenter: William Zielinski, Chief Information Officer, Information & Technology Services; Brita Andercheck, Chief Data Officer, Data Analytics & Business Intelligence

agenda_items.title: Procurement Solicitation and Evaluation Process
agenda_items.description: Overview of the procurement solicitation and evaluation process.
agenda_items.presenter: Danielle Thompson, Director, Office of Procurement Services; Kimberly Franklyn, Manager, Office of Procurement Services

agenda_items.title: Dallas City Hall- Priority Major Maintenance Projects
agenda_items.description: Discussion on major maintenance projects for Dallas City Hall.

agenda_items.title: Development Services- Monthly Performance Update & Process Map Improvements
agenda_items.description: Monthly performance update and improvements in process mapping for Development Services.

agenda_items.title: Review of City Real Estate for Development and Redevelopment Opportunities
agenda_items.description: Review of potential development and redevelopment opportunities for city real estate.
